content.raw: Gazebo is standalone and doesn't know about any externally running ROS nodes. The only possible solution might be to have a drcsim plugin catch the Gazebo reset event (if this gets published as a Gazebo message? ... otherwise some time comparison) and publish an empty message to ``/reset_time`` which should fix the problem.
